0.1.name: wordpress/allow-latex-uploads
0.1.description:
Ever noticed that when you try to upload a .tex file to your WordPress blog, it's mysteriously blocked? This plugin simply allows for LaTeX file uploading.

In particular, it supports the .tex, .latex, .ps, and .dvi extensions. .pdf is already supported by the WordPress core.

This plugin is a component of the MIT Educational Collaboration Space project at the MIT Department of Mathematics.
